resources.string: This app is designed to pin a quick and simple memo on the home screen.

How to use:
 0. Long press on the home screen.

 1. Select WIDGETS on the bottom.

 2. Scroll down till you find the app icon.

 3. Long press the icon to pin it on the home screen.

 4. An configuration interface would show up.

 5. Configure the memo and Click DONE.

 6. Long click to resize.
